functions.name: extractKeywords
functions.description: Extract keywords from a corpus of text documents

parameters.name: corpus
parameters.description: Array of text documents to extract keywords from

parameters.name: maxKeywords
parameters.description: Maximum number of keywords to extract per document

events.name: onProgress
events.description: Fired when ML model loading or processing makes progress

parameters.name: progressData
parameters.description: Progress information including modelType, progress percentage, type, and status

functions.name: generateEmbeddings
functions.description: Generate embeddings for a list of text strings using ML engine

parameters.name: textToEmbedList
parameters.description: Array of text strings to generate embeddings for

functions.name: predictTopic
functions.description: Generate topic from keywords and documents using ML engine

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: Array of keywords to generate topic from
